ReviewList.Text: The main thing I needed from this purchase was the mastering physics part. After I recieved it I tried logging in and the code that they sent me said that it had already expired! When I called all they said they could do was put 23.50 back on my card. This was unexceptable! If your getting this for a class do not do it! It's a huge inconvinience!
This product came as advertised and the price was great. Needless to say I love it and it deserves a positive review.
Didn't realize it was only half of the physics series. But nevertheless its what I needed for class.

This review really has nothing to do with the book, because really, its a Physics text book, what do you expect.. its boring. My gripe is with the "service" from Amazon. I payed over $20 to overnight this book to me because my school bookstore was out of it and then I get an email from them regretfully informing me that oops they didn't ship my book in time, sorry. And five days later I still didn't have it. This caused me to not only miss one homework assignment, but two. If you want something shipped to you quickly then I definitely suggest finding somewhere else. I have ordered from Amazon many times before and have had stuff delivered faster using standard free shipping than this. Extremely disappointed.

This book came as advertised, new in good condition.  The problem was that I paid a considerable amount (over ten dollars) for two day shipping and it was not even shipped for over a week after I paid for it.  Beware if you are purchasing a textbook or something you need fast. I cannot find a way to dispute the shipping with amazon, and the late shipping caused me to lose points in class.
